entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
